channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: ‘We’re really pleased with the reception.’ Meta’s Display smart glasses are a hit — but that’s not good news if you want a pair
item.description: The Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses are so popular that their international launch is on ‘pause’.

item.title: Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro : déjà plus de 100 € de remise pour cette récente montre connectée qui combine élégance et fonctions sportives
item.description: Endurante, précise dans ses données et très stylée, la Huawei Watch GT 6 Pro est une montre connectée réussie. Actuellement, AliExpress la vend à 273,96 euros au lieu de 379,99 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: Valve announced the 2025 Steam Awards winners (and shockingly Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 didn't win everything)
item.description: Valve has revealed the winners of the 2025 Steam Awards.

item.title: HP just squeezed a desktop computer into a keyboard – and it's powerful enough to be a Copilot+ PC
item.description: HP packed a powerful Ryzen CPU, DDR5 RAM and storage into a peripheral to make the world's first keyboard that's a Copilot+ PC.

item.title: Florida’s Surgeon General Is Now Peddling Fake Water
item.description: In a recent social media post, Joseph Ladapo endorsed the use of structured water, which doesn't actually seem to exist.

item.title: The long-rumored Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake could finally be announced soon, as leaked domain registration surfaces online
item.description: The domain registration for the long-rumored Assassin's Creed Black Flag remake has seemingly been leaked online, suggesting Assassin's Creed Black Flag Resynced could be announced imminently.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Targets Retired Astronaut’s Pension for ‘Illegal Orders’ Video
item.description: The 90-second video urging U.S. military personnel to refuse to follow illegal orders was deemed "punishable by DEATH!"

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures montres connectées de 2026 ?
item.description: Vous voulez craquer sur une smartwatch ? Galaxy Watch, Pixel Watch, Apple Watch, Garmin ou encore Withings. Voici notre sélection des meilleures montres connectées testées par notre rédaction pour accompagner votre smartphone Android ou votre iPhone.

item.title: LEGO Smart Play : explications techniques sur le fonctionnement des briques connectées
item.description: On a vu les jolis vaisseaux Star Wars. Mais le vrai sujet n'est pas là. Le vrai sujet, c'est comment LEGO a réussi à faire entrer un ASIC, des capteurs et une batterie dans une brique standard de 2x4 tenons. Pas d'écran, pas de smartphone : c'est la technologie Smart Play.

item.title: This portable triple laptop monitor can quadruple your total screen resolution to 4K — and unlike others, it only requires a single USB-C cable to make it all work
item.description: This KYY monitor extender gives your laptop a full four-screen workspace from a single USB-C cable.

item.title: Amazon just unveiled its first Fire TV Stick interface upgrade in five years – and it could spell trouble for Google TV
item.description: From new colors to Alexa+, these are all the new features in the next Fire TV redesign.

item.title: Pebble's founder might be just the right person to make an AI ring
item.description: Eric Migicovsky has been thinking a lot about friction. Specifically, he’s been thinking about how too much friction in the way of using a device can put people off wearing it altogether. The founder of Pebble is here at CES 2026 with a few new devices from the company he recently started to bring back the beloved smartwatch brand, including the Pebble Round 2 and the Index 01. That second one is a simple ring with a button on it that you push down to talk to Pebble’s AI whenever you want it to help you remember something. In the sea of AI gadgets that clutter the showfloors of CES (and the cu...

item.title: Roborock launches its first robot lawn mower in the US
item.description: Roborock is finally bringing its bots to yards in the US, several months after expanding into robot lawn mowers last year. The Roborock RockMow X1 LiDAR, announced today at CES, will be launching later this year, featuring autonomous navigation, all-wheel drive, and 360-degree 3D scanning using a combination of LiDAR and Visual Simultaneous Localization and […]...

item.title: Roborock’s new Saros 20 robot vacuum cleaners got a climbing upgrade
item.description: Roborock's latest robovacs don't need help getting out of tricky situations. At least, that's one of the perks of the improved AdaptiLift Chassis 3.0 on the Roborock Saros 20 and Saros 20 Sonic announced today at CES 2026. The upgraded chassis in Roborock's new flagship robot vacuum cleaners allows the bots to climb over thresholds […]

item.title: Roborock’s Next Stair-Climbing Robot Vacuum Has Actual Legs
item.description: Whether this stair-climbing—and cleaning!—robot is the first true whole-home robot vacuum remains to be seen.

item.title: Hugh Jackman’s New ‘Robin Hood’ Movie Channels Old Man Logan
item.description: 'The Death of Robin Hood,' co-starring Jodie Comer and Bill Skarsgård, opens later this year.

item.title: Roborock’s Rover walks, jumps, and vacuums your stairs
item.description: I've been reviewing robot vacuums for almost a decade, and one question I hear repeatedly is "When will it clean my stairs?" Well, we finally have an answer. Sort of. At CES 2026 this week, Roborock launched the Saros Rover, a robot vacuum with articulating legs on wheels that let it climb a full staircase […]

item.title: You might mistake Satechi’s new Thunderbolt 5 hub for Apple’s Mac Mini
item.description: Satechi is launching a new dock that supports Intel's Thunderbolt 5 technology - and it looks a lot like an Apple Mac Mini. The Thunderbolt 5 CubeDock fits an NVMe SSD enclosure and several ports inside a relatively compact form factor, measuring 5 inches wide and 2 inches tall. And at $399.99, the device is […]

item.title: You can now use Abbott’s OTC glucose monitors with Withings
item.description: Withings isn't done with CES 2026 announcements just yet. The French health tech company just announced a new partnership with Abbott. In the first quarter of the year, Abbott Lingo users will be able to view their glucose data within the Withings app. Lingo is Abbott's over-the-counter continuous glucose monitor (CGM) for nondiabetic people. Withings […]...

item.title: Roborock finally adds a roller mop to its vast robot vacuum lineup
item.description: The market leader in robot vacuums has been behind in the latest trend - roller mops. But not for much longer. At CES this week, Roborock announced the Qrevo Curv 2 Flow, its first robot vacuum and mop with a motorized self-cleaning roller mop. The Flow features an extra-wide mop that the company says can […]

item.title: InkPoster launches a premium, 41-inch e-paper display for your home
item.description: Last year, PocketBook rocked up at CES with a series of large e-paper displays to display art on the walls of your home. This year, the company has turned up with a far larger, A1-sized model called the Duna, which it says mimics the “texture, depth and tonal richness of printed paper.” It’s intended to act as an upmarket alternative to those big screen TVs which display art when they’re not being used for their intended purpose. Unsurprisingly, such a fancy product also needs some fancy accessories, so it’s recruited Italian design house Pininfarina to help. It claims the credit for the Duna’...

item.title: Lovense launches an AI 'companion doll' at CES
item.description: The following article discusses themes of an adult nature.Lovense has turned up to CES with a “companion doll,” a life-size sex doll that’s designed to be more than just a life size sex doll. The company has equipped it with its proprietary AI engine and promises “human-like cognition, emotional awareness and expressive behavior.” The doll, which in the marketing video is called Emily, is Lovense’s answer to the global loneliness crisis. It says, over time, a user’s relationship with the system will grow deeper as it learns to adapt to their needs. And that the doll is the natural evolution of...

item.title: Pebble seeks to remedy the wearable industry's original sin
item.description: As soon as I held the Pebble Round 2 in my hand, I suddenly realized what I’d been missing for the better part of a decade. I’ve always felt smartwatches should supplement, rather than supplant, your phone, but that’s an attitude that feels almost quaint these days. After all, Apple and Samsung believe everyone wants a watch that can do almost everything your phone can do. But that wasn’t the prevailing opinion at the dawn of the smartwatch era, either philosophically or from limitations in the technology. Back then, companies like Pebble, Vector, Basis and others all built devices that added ...

item.title: Satechi is embracing Thunderbolt 5 at CES with a new dock and cable
item.description: Multiple of Satechi's Thunderbolt 4 docks are on Engadget's list of the best docking stations, so when the company announces a new accessory, it's usually worth a look. At CES 2026, Satechi is finally making the jump to Thunderbolt 5 with a new docking station and cable. The Thunderbolt 5 CubeDock with SSD Enclosure and Thunderbolt 5 Pro Cable leverage the faster speeds of Intel's cable tech, and in the case of the dock, also include extra benefits like space for SSD storage.The CubeDock is made from a block of solid aluminum and is clearly supposed to evoke Apple's desktop Macs, like the new ...

item.title: Aspiration puissante, lavage des serpillières à 100 ºC, petites pattes pour franchir les seuils : voici les nouveaux Roborock Saros 20
item.description: Comme à son habitude, Roborock profite du CES pour présenter ses derniers aspirateurs porte-étendards. Au programme, deux modèles qui se différencient principalement par leurs serpillières.

item.title: Roborock a craqué : un aspirateur avec des jambes pour tuer et on devine très bien à quoi ça sert
item.description: C'est le boss final des aspirateurs robots : l'escalier. Jusqu'ici, aucun constructeur n'avait de solution crédible, malgré pas mal de prototypes à l'IFA 2025. Roborock vient peut-être de changer la donne au CES 2026. Pas avec une nouvelle brosse ou plus d'IA, mais avec un concept de châssis à jambes articulées capable de mimétiser la marche humaine. ...

item.title: Razer is making a version of its best controller specifically for LG Smart TVs — and you can check it out at CES 2026
item.description: Razer just announced an LG Smart TV controller based on its excellent Wolverine V3 Pro at CES 2026.

item.title: Google TV : Gemini va prendre la main sur les réglages de la télé
item.description: Gemini continue de se faire une petite place dans Google TV. Le géant du web a annoncé plusieurs nouveautés IA, plus ou moins utiles il faut le reconnaitre, pour faciliter la vie des téléspectateurs devant leur télé connectée.

item.title: I tested this Lenovo Legion gaming laptop and its design is sumptuous — but there are better performers at this price point
item.description: The Lenovo Legion 7i Gen 10 certainly has the looks, but does it have the grunt?

item.title: Nvidia Is Pushing the Number of Fake Frames for Games to Ludicrous Levels
item.description: DLSS isn’t done evolving, even if it means more and more AI.

item.title: Game Pass en janvier 2026 : on commence l’année avec du lourd dans cette première sélection de 2026 !
item.description: Microsoft vient de dévoiler la première sélection de 2026 pour son Game Pass. Plus d'une dizaine de jeux sont à l'honneur entre les titres AAA et quelques jeux indés. Voici ce qui vous occupera les prochaines semaines.

item.title: Betelgeuse’s Hidden Companion May Finally Be Revealing Itself
item.description: With this new evidence, the existence of “Betelbuddy” is closer than ever to being confirmed.

item.title: Forget dry January, Apple TV's hit wine drama returns soon – and its cast has the perfect pairing
item.description: Adapted from a cult manga, Apple TV's hit wine drama is set to return with a second season that's another full sensory journey, according to the cast.

item.title: Corsair made a keyboard with a built-in Stream Deck
item.description: Corsair just revealed a gaming keyboard with a built-in Stream Deck controller at CES 2026. The Galleon 100 SD is a mechanical keyboard with a 5-inch screen, two rotary encoders and a full complement of Stream Deck buttons. For the uninitiated, the Stream Deck is basically a collection of hot keys that execute various commands. It's been incredibly popular for streamers and the like, but it's also become a boon for PC gamers. Corsair is advertising the Galleon 100 SD directly to gamers, so it boasts of hot keys being used to "access abilities, call in airstrikes and manage inventory without di...

item.title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems installs reactor magnet, lands deal with Nvidia
item.description: The fusion power frontrunner said that construction on its Sparc reactor was proceeding as planned. Meanwhile, it's building a digital twin to help dial it in.

item.title: Amazon has a massive Fitbit sale — up to 40% off its best-selling smartwatches and activity trackers
item.description: There's a massive Fitbit sale on Amazon, and I've rounded up the best deals, including up to 40% off the Charge 6, Sense 2, Versa 3, and Versa 4.

item.title: Mauvaise nouvelle : cette découverte remet en cause les possibilités d'une vie extraterrestre à cet endroit du Système solaire
item.description: Parmi les corps du Système solaire où l'on peut espérer trouver des formes de vie, Europe fait partie des candidats les plus prometteurs. Malheureusement, cette lune de Jupiter n'aurait aucune activité tectonique, ce qui pourrait empêcher le développement d'une vie extraterrestre.

item.title: Notorious hacking collective returns - but researchers say they fell for a honeypot
item.description: Scattered Lapsus$ Hunters fell for a honeypot and exposed IP addresses and other valuable data.

item.title: ElevationLabs' TimeCapsule extended battery case for AirTags is 30 percent off
item.description: ElevationLab makes a battery case for your AirTag that can power it for 10 years and the accessory is on sale now for 30 percent off. Normally retailing for $23, you can pick one up for $16. The TimeCapsule case uses two AA batteries to offer up to 14 times the lifespan of the CR2032 battery that powers an AirTag. The company based those estimates on Energizer Ultimate Lithium batteries, so your mileage may vary. Once an AirTag is seated inside the case, which is a compact 4.45 x 1.57 inches, it is sealed shut with four screws at the corners. The case is fiber-reinforced, according to Elevatio...

item.title: Tsunami Triggered by Giant Russian Quake Broke the Rules, Satellite Data Shows
item.description: The 2025 tsunami is shattering old models, thanks to observations from space.

item.title: The price of gold is back on the rise and near an all-time high. Here’s why
item.description: With 2026 already marked by geopolitical volatility, investors are once again turning to safe-haven assets, even as stock markets shrug off the chaos. It’s not just XRP that is having a good 2026 so far. One of the world’s oldest assets, gold, is also having a good run in the first week of the year. Here’s where the precious metal stands, and why its price is rising....

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures montres connectées pas chères en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous voulez une montre connectée, mais vous n'avez pas un budget extensif ? Frandroid vous propose 7 modèles de montres connectées pas chères (sous les 200 euros) pour faire autant plaisir à votre poignet qu'à votre portefeuille.

item.title: Assassin's Creed Hexe director has seemingly been named as Batman: Arkham Origins' director Benoit Richer
item.description: Ubisoft has reportedly appointed Batman: Arkham Origins' director Benoit Richer as the lead on Assassin's Creed Codename Hexe. The director seemed to confirm his position on his LinkedIn profile.

item.title: LG C6 et G6, des téléviseurs OLED toujours plus lumineux, mais pas pour toutes les tailles
item.description: LG rebat les cartes de sa gamme OLED en 2026 avec les séries G6 et C6, toutes deux basculant sur des variantes de panneaux Tandem plus lumineux et mieux maîtrisés en termes de reflets. Les TV LG G6 sont renforcés en tant que vitrine technologique, mais la série C6 est fragmentée. On vous explique tout.

item.title: All the laptops that caught our eye at CES 2026
item.description: CES remains a key stage for laptop makers to lay out their plans for the year ahead. At CES 2026, that meant new flagship productivity machines, reconsidered gaming notebooks and solid incremental updates across several major lineups. While we’re still seeing embargoes lift and hands-on time on the show floor, the announcements below reflect the most significant laptops we’ve seen so far. Plus, the list will grow as more companies reveal details throughout January 6 and beyond.Samsung Galaxy Book6 seriesNew Samsung Galaxy Book6 laptops offer NVIDIA RTX 50-series GPUs.Samsung announced the Gala...

item.title: LG's UltraGear GX7 is its fastest and brightest OLED gaming monitor to date
item.description: LG just announced its fastest and brightest OLED gaming monitor yet at CES, the 27-inch UltraGear GX7. The new QHD display, which uses LG Display's 4th-gen RGB Tandem 2.0 OLED tech, can hit 335 nits typical brightness and is DisplayHDR True Black 500 certified. At the same time, it offers an outstanding 540Hz refresh rate at QHD (720Hz at HD) and a .002ms grey-to-grey (GtG) response time. So in other words, about 5,000 times faster than the best human reflexes. Though a gaming monitor by design, the GX7 would make an excellent content creation monitor too thanks to the true 10-bit panel that...

item.title: Amazon’s ‘Tomb Raider’ Show Has Found Its Cast
item.description: Sophie Turner's Lara Croft is joined by a few familiar faces from the games, and plenty of new ones.

item.title: Klipsch is getting back into the hi-fi headphone game
item.description: Other than some earbuds, Klipsch hasn't made any headphones in a number of years. But the company is teasing a big return for 2026 at CES. Klipsch announced its Atlas series, a family of high-end hi-fi headphones that pick up where its Heritage headphone line left off. The HP-1 are a wireless over-ear model with […]

item.title: LG’s fastest and brightest OLED gaming monitor is $999.99
item.description: LG is launching its dual mode GX7 OLED monitor in the US, with refresh rates up to 720Hz. Based on LG Display's fourth-generation WOLED panel, the 26.5-inch 27GX790B can run at 540Hz in 1440p resolution, or an impressive 720Hz in a not-so-impressive 720p resolution. The dual mode option lets you switch between the 540Hz and […]

item.title: How Lego designed its new interactive Smart Brick
item.description: It took the analog toy company years to develop its new Smart Play system, which centers on digitally minded bricks that can play sounds, light up, and interact with each other. While the Lego Group has dipped its toes into tech waters before, the company hasn’t strayed far from its analog roots. But on Monday, the 94-year-old company unveiled a new product line that embraces the digital age, without abandoning its core business....

item.title: Valve fait exploser le jeu vidéo sous Linux grâce à son Steam Deck
item.description: Le Steam Deck, ce petit PC de poche signé Valve, continue de prouver qu’il n’est pas qu’une curiosité pour geeks. Non seulement il fait tourner vos jeux Steam n’importe où, mais il a aussi contribué à un phénomène inattendu : faire de Linux une véritable plateforme de jeu.

item.title: Les joueurs PC fuient les processeurs Intel, AMD se frotte les mains
item.description: Selon le dernier sondage Steam sur les machines des utilisateurs, les parts d'Intel sont en baisse tandis que celles d'AMD ne cessent de grimper.

item.title: Today's January sales can save you up to £650 on a brand new laptop - but they're ending soon
item.description: Regardless of whether you're looking for a super-cheap laptop or a high-end MacBook, this week's January sales are well worth considering before they end for good.

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Jaguar Land Rover sales fall after infamous cyber incident
item.description: JLR sales are down globally, but US import tariffs and Jaguar's reinvention are also to blame together with the cyberattack.

item.title: Anker’s display-equipped Nano Charger is on sale following its CES debut
item.description: Anker just announced three new chargers at CES 2026, and surprisingly, one of them is already on sale ahead of its launch on January 20th launch. Anker’s latest 45W Nano Charger, the company’s first Nano Charger to sport a built-in display, is available to preorder from Anker’s online storefront in one of several colors for […]

item.title: Quelle manette pour PS5 (DualSense) et PS4 acheter en 2026 ?
item.description: Vous avez besoin d’une nouvelle manette de PlayStation ? Contrairement aux Xbox, les consoles de Sony n’ont accès qu’à peu de manettes de constructeurs tiers. Voici les différentes manettes que vous pouvez utiliser sur PS5 et PS4.

item.title: CES 2026: Day 1 roundup of the coolest tech on display
item.description: Highlights included a newly announced partnership between Lego and the Star Wars franchise. Nvidia, AMD and Intel all had important chip and AI platform announcements on the first day of CES 2026, but all audiences wanted to see more of was Star Wars and Jensen Huang’s little robot buddies.CES is a huge opportunity annually for companies both large and small to parade products they plan to put on shelves this year. As predicted, artificial intelligence was anchored in nearly everything as tech firms continue to look for AI products that will attract customers.Here are the highlights from Day 1...

item.title: Lenovo Tech World at CES 2026 live - we're in Las Vegas for the big event as it happens
item.description: We're live in Las Vegas for Lenovo Tech World at CES 2026.

item.title: La nouvelle Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ avec écran 90 Hz est déjà presque à moitié prix, mais seulement aujourd’hui
item.description: La Samsung Galaxy Tab A11+ est une récente tablette familiale abordable, mais mieux dotée que sa sœur, la Tab A11 classique. En cette nouvelle année 2026, vous la trouverez dans un pack à 169,99 euros au lieu de 289,99 euros via ODR.

item.title: If you're after a gaming headset upgrade this new year, then you won't go wrong with the brilliant SteelSeries Arctis Nova 5 at a massively discounted price
item.description: The SteelSeries Arctis Nova 5 is one of my favorite wireless gaming headsets of recent years. You can save a whole lot of money on it right now, too, with it being discounted at Amazon.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold hands-on: Flexing is believing at CES 2026
item.description: When I first heard whispers about the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold, I immediately felt conflicted. On one hand it felt like the natural evolution of bi-fold phones like the Z Fold 7. But on the other, all this fancy tech comes with an even higher price — around $2,500 based on current conversion rates from Korean won — not to mention the added bulk you get from a third folding panel. So even as someone who has used a foldable as my daily driver for almost a decade straight, it felt like Samsung’s latest high-end phone was going backwards in terms of both portability and affordability. But then at ...

item.title: These understated new desktop speakers have one little feature that'll make them rival your TV's soundbar
item.description: The Edifier M90 adds HDMI eARC to the party, marking the brand's first active speakers with the connection

item.title: Google Chrome : cette fonction ultra pratique sur PC arrive enfin sur Android (mais pas pour tout le monde)
item.description: Google prépare une nouveauté pour la version Android du navigateur Chrome. Pratique, elle devrait malheureusement être réservée à certains appareils.

item.title: Jouez directement sur votre TV LG avec une manette certifiée, c’est la garantie d’une expérience optimale
item.description: LG inaugure un label de certification pour manettes compatibles avec son Gaming Portal et le déploie pour la première fois avec la Razer Wolverine V3 Bluetooth, une manette sans fil optimisée pour le cloud gaming sur ses téléviseurs webOS.

item.title: The biggest TV announcements at CES 2026
item.description: TVs are a staple of CES, and so far, manufacturers have not disappointed with their announcements at CES 2026. Companies including Samsung, LG and others came to the event ready to show off updates to existing display tech and some genuinely new technologies. OLED and Mini LED remain central to most lineups, while Micro RGB has emerged as one of the most talked-about developments at the show so far, especially at the higher end of the TV market. Below are the TV announcements that stood out most from the pre-show events and early press conferences, with more expected as CES continues. Samsung ...
